alert.note: Alert for Lower St. Martin; St. Mary (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:41PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern St. Mary and south central St. Martin Parishes through 515 PM CDT... At 440 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Patterson Memorial Airport, or near Patterson, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Morgan City, Franklin, Patterson, Berwick, Bayou Vista, Patterson Memorial Airport and Centerville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
